text: Filmfare Award for Best Actor is given by the filmfare as part of its annual Filmfare Awards South for Tamil film lead actors. The Filmfare Awards South Awards were extended to "Best Actor" in 1972. The year indicates the year of release of the film. ==Superlatives== Superlative Best Actor - Tamil Most awards Kamal Haasan 10 awards Second most winner Vikram 5 awards Category:Indian awards Category:Movie awards
